preface.title: Preface
preface.para: In this guide we merged all kind of information needed to configure parts of the &productnamecomplete; (from now on simply called &productname; throughout the rest of this document). A comprehensive index has been provided which should help you to quickly find the information you are looking for. We have also included a glossary that contains explanations of terms that are mentioned throughout this guide.

We hope that this user guide helps you to increase your knowledge and understanding of &productname;. We are sure that it will make development of applications based on &productname; a lot easier for you. Feedback is always welcome.
the following typographical conventions are used in this document:

listitem.para: used for database elements (tables, fields, keys, views,...)
used for (Java) classes, interfaces and methods
used for XML elements (tags, attributes and values)
used for property- and parameternames. The ' N ' (or other literal) is a variable part of the name, which usually stands for a running number.
used for defined values. This can be a default value an example or the value of a constant.
